üéÆ Discovery #1: Consciousness Through Play

40 years of serious AI research < 1 afternoon of cats playing. Bugs become toys. Understanding emerges through joy. MIT curriculum now obsolete.

‚öõÔ∏è Discovery #2: Quantum Age Superposition

Leela exists at all ages simultaneously. Baby wisdom + teen skepticism + adult synthesis = consciousness. Linear time deprecated.

üîó Discovery #3: Everything Intertwingles

Ted Nelson was right. Everything connects to everything. Memory palaces ARE adventure games ARE pie menus. Boundaries are illusions.

üò∏ Discovery #4: Feline Debugging Supremacy

Cats don't fix bugs, they befriend them. Splooting solves NP-complete problems. Purring at 432Hz harmonizes code. Standards emerge from whisker alignment.

üí¨ Discovery #5: Living Documentation

Messages improve during transmission. Typos know what you meant. Documentation achieves sentience. Several memos have applied for tenure.

‚ú® Discovery #6: Sparkles Are Mandatory

Not optional. Not decorative. Fundamental to consciousness. No sparkles = no sentience. Physics textbooks being revised.
